ISBN.description: The International Standard Book Number assigned to the book.

RatingDist1.description: The number of 1-star reviews the book has received.

RatingDist2.description: The number of 2-star reviews the book has received.

RatingDist3.description: The number of 3-star reviews the book has received.

RatingDist4.description: The number of 4-star reviews the book has received.

RatingDist5.description: The number of 5-star reviews the book has received.

RatingDistTotal.description: The total number of reviews the book has received across all star ratings.

CountsOfReview.description: The total count of reviews the book has received.

Rating.description: The average rating of the book based on user reviews, represented as a floating-point number.

PagesNumber.description: The total number of pages in the book.

id.description: A unique identifier for the book in the database.
